name: cps-drone-cyber-defense
description: CPS Drone Simulation with Cyber Attack Scenarios and Defense Mechanisms

scripts.all: npm run baseline && npm run scenario1 && npm run scenario2 && npm run scenario3
scripts.attacks: npm run scenario1 && npm run scenario2 && npm run scenario3
scripts.presentation:
npm run baseline && echo '

=== Press Ctrl+C to stop and run next scenario ===' && npm run scenario1
scripts.help:
node -e "console.log('
' + '='.repeat(80) + '
' + 'CPS DRONE SIMULATION - PROJECT PART B' + '
' + '='.repeat(80) + '

' + 'BASELINE (Normal Operation - Multithreaded Architecture):
' + '  npm test              - Run multithreaded figure-8 with Reference Governor
' + '  npm run baseline      - Same as npm test
' + '  npm run multithreaded - Same as npm test

' + 'CYBER ATTACK SCENARIOS:
' + '  npm run scenario1     - Scenario 1: GPS Spoofing (FDI Attack)
' + '  npm run scenario2     - Scenario 2: DoS Attack (Packet Drops)
' + '  npm run scenario3     - Scenario 3: Replay Attack (Stuxnet-style)

' + 'SHORTCUTS:
' + '  npm run attack:gps    - Same as scenario1
' + '  npm run attack:dos    - Same as scenario2
' + '  npm run attack:replay - Same as scenario3

' + 'MULTITHREADED OPTIONS:
' + '  npm run mt:norg       - Multithreaded WITHOUT Reference Governor
' + '  npm run mt:hover      - Multithreaded hover test (with RG)

' + 'RUN ALL:
' + '  npm run all           - Run baseline + all 3 attack scenarios
' + '  npm run attacks       - Run only the 3 attack scenarios

' + 'PRESENTATION MODE:
' + '  npm run presentation  - Demo mode (baseline then attacks)

' + '='.repeat(80) + '
')"

author: CPS Course Project
